description: Retrieves a list of findings generated by the specified analyzer. ListFindings and ListFindingsV2 both use access-analyzer:ListFindings in the Action element of an IAM policy statement. You must have permission to perform the access-analyzer:ListFindings action. To learn about filter keys that you can use to retrieve a list of findings, see IAM Access Analyzer filter keys in the IAM User Guide.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer to retrieve findings from.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A filter to match for the findings to return. (string) --- (dict) --- The criteria to use in the filter that defines the archive rule. For more information on available filter keys, see IAM Access Analyzer filter keys. eq (list) --- An 'equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule. (string) --- neq (list) --- A 'not equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule. (string) --- contains (list) --- A 'contains' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule. (string) --- exists (boolean) --- An 'exists' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: eq
nested_params.description: An 'equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: neq
nested_params.description: A 'not equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: contains
nested_params.description: A 'contains' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: exists
nested_params.description: An 'exists' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The criteria used to sort. attributeName (string) --- The name of the attribute to sort on. orderBy (string) --- The sort order, ascending or descending.

nested_params.name: attributeName
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to sort on.

nested_params.name: orderBy
nested_params.description: The sort order, ascending or descending.

nested_items.name: findings
nested_items.description: A list of findings retrieved from the analyzer that match the filter criteria specified, if any.

nested_items.name: analyzedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the resource-based policy or IAM entity that generated the finding was analyzed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was created.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: The error that resulted in an Error finding.

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The resource that the external principal has access to.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the resource that the external principal has access to.

nested_items.name: resourceOwnerAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: findingType
nested_items.description: The type of the external access or unused access finding.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token used for pagination of results returned.
